title: team icon in game logo
body: how can i have the logo from the champ teams appear in game when i press ctrl6, what do i have to do?

replies.body:
You'll want to grab one of the pro team summoner icons and upgrade it through the hextech crafting system. You'll need 10 *championship jewels* to upgrade it to a tier 2 icon and 12 *championship jewels* to upgrade it to a tier 3 icon. Check out our rundown [here.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/226192107-2016-Worlds-Guide-Crafting-championship-skins-and-more-)

Let me know if you have any other questions.
well just to be sure is there a way to upload a photo so i can show you where I'm at exactly cause i already have 3 of the icons (gold, grey, green) from the team i want.
Sure, you can use [Gyazo](https://gyazo.com/) to snap a screenshot and toss the link at me.

Yup, looks like you crafted those icons successfully! It looks like you're holding strong that SKT is likely to win worlds this year, huh?

Also, just wanted to confirm that emotes and recalls from these icons expire on *November 6 at 23:59 PST*

Let me know if you have any other questions or concerns.
